Package model

Class Invader

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Invader
public class Invader extends Entity
The Invader class is responsible for all Invader logic. The Invader can shoot, be shot, have hp values greater than 1, and drop coins.

  • Constructor Details

    • Invader

      public Invader(Game game, float x, float y, float width, float height, float speed)
      Construct invader.
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate to
      x - absolute x to spawn at (children centered)
      y - absolute y to spawn at (children centered)
      width - to scale collider and sprite to
      height - to scale collider and sprite to
      speed - of the invader (vertical and horizontal)

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Should be overriden to add functionality for game tick updates. If instantiated, the game will be able to call this method on every game update. Will not be called as soon as it is deleted with .delete().
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity

    • setMaxHp

      public void setMaxHp(int newMaxHp)
      Set a new max hp for the invader. If the hp is greater than one then we make a healthbar to show it has more than 1 hp.
      Parameters:
      newMaxHp - to set

    • shootBullet

      public void shootBullet()
      Shoot an invader bullet going downwards while making a shooting sound.

    • setInvaderType

      public void setInvaderType(InvaderType invaderType)
      Set the type of invader this is. The InvaderType can later be used to determine point counts and invader sprite.
      Parameters:
      invaderType - to set this invader to.

    • getInvaderType

      public InvaderType getInvaderType()
      Get the invader type this.
      Returns:
      the invader type of this.

    • getScoreChange

      public int getScoreChange()
      Get the score that this invader is worth.
      Returns:
      the score worth of the invader as int
